707390.name: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony OST
707390.description:
Murder Nocturne is a 10-track bonus soundtrack available as an early purchase bonus from September 26 – October 3, 2017.
*Purchases made after 10/3/2017 are NOT eligible to receive the DLC.

All songs composed by beatmaker Masafumi Takada.

Contains MP3 and FLAC files.

[COMPLETE TRACK LISTING]

01. DANGANRONPA V3
02. EXISAL TRIBE
03. NEW A.A. (CH. 1)
04. BEAUTIFUL LIFE (LOOP)
05. V3 DEBATE -BREAK-
06. SEASON OF DESPAIR
07. CLASS TRIAL: SPACE EDITION
08. HANGMAN’S GAMBIT VER 3.0
09. LIVING IN A CRAZY PARALLEL WORLD (LOOP)
10. NEW A.A. (CH. 3)
707390.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 日语*, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
